title: All Of His Exes Look Like His MOM! Should She Be Freaked Out?
description:
We heard from one Bert Show Listener who was freaked out because her boyfriend's ex looked a lot like her...well, we're gonna one up that. Her boyfriend's exes all look like HIS OWN MOTHER?!!
